title: Coyote's Mate
description: For six years Anya Korbin worked with Del-Rey Delgatothe genetically altered rebel known as the Coyote Ghostto free a group of coyote women kept in her fathers lab. As Anya matured into a woman, she and Del-Rey grew closebut then he broke his promise and killed her father. Now she must deal with her animalistic desire for the one who betrayed her.
author: Lora Leigh
